content: > **update 06/2021 ** > > i have created a paid pdf version for this > blanket > > the pdf contains > * materials for all four colourways/seasons > * written-only instructions for parts 1-4 of sophie s universe forms the > gardens/squares > * round-by-round charts by the very talented masako kawahara > * instructions and photos for layout joining and border > >the pdf has been created with much love and attention > to details if you need help with any > part of the gardens links are > provided to the free step-by-step photo > tutorials and detailed video > tutorials sophie s dream is created by making 12 sophie s gardens part 1-4 of sophie s universe 1 in scheepjes whirl colour-changing yarn these squares are then joined and bordered using scheepjes whirlette in colourways that both compliment and calm the colours in the whirls the free pattern includes links to the relevant parts of sohie s universe with photo tutorials and video tutorials as well as hints about layout and instructions for expanding joining and bordering for all four colourways i hope you enjoy this pattern dedri ps this blanket was made by my friend and side-kick jenny lowman **more colourways ** * sophie s winter dream 2 march 2020 * sophie s spring dream 3 * sophie s autumn dream 4 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sophies-universe-cal 2 https //lookatwhatimade net/crafts/yarn/crochet/free-crochet-patterns/sophies-winter-dream/ 3 https //lookatwhatimade net/crafts/yarn/crochet/free-crochet-patterns/sophies-spring-dream/ 4 https //lookatwhatimade net/crafts/yarn/crochet/free-crochet-patterns/sophies-autumn-dream/
